during the 1942 vfl season , punt road oval venue record the highest crowd participation
resp:

1. Compare the crowd numbers for each venue mentioned in the table to determine which one has the highest number of participants.
2. Identify the row corresponding to Punt Road Oval by looking at the "venue" column. In this case, it's the first row with a value of "punt road oval".
3. Look at the "crowd" column for the same row to find the number of attendees at Punt Road Oval. The crowd was 18000 people.
4. Compare the crowd numbers from all other venues in the table, and see if any exceeds the 18000 participants at Punt Road Oval.
5. No other venue has a higher number of attendees (all other venues have fewer than 18000 participants).
6. Since the crowd at Punt Road Oval is the highest among all venues in the table, it can be concluded that during the 1942 VFL season, Punt Road Oval did record the highest crowd participation.
